levels.levelDescription: Welcome to the Ethereal Woods, where the pink-sand pathways weave through mystical trees, shimmering with enchantment. Beware of the hidden water traps lurking beneath the surface, ready to drag the unwary into their depths.

Venture into the treacherous Frostbite Canyon, where the icy snow crunches beneath your feet. Beware of the deep-dark-holes scattered along the path, leading to unknown depths where chilling winds whisper of danger.

Descend into the depths of the Shadowed Catacombs, where fractured-wall-platforms offer a precarious walkway amidst the ancient tombs. Lava flows ominously nearby, a reminder of the legendary Void Stalker, Eclipsorak the Soulrender, lurking in the darkness ahead.
